name: Storm Striker
description:
• Engage in 5v5 team battles with action-packed combat involving swords and magic!

Experience a thrilling action PvP game with diverse combat styles, ranging from long-range warfare to close-quarters brawling.





  • Choose from a wide array of characters, each with their own unique combat styles.

Whether you prefer combo-centric characters, psychological warfare specialists, strategic thinkers, or precise aim-dependent combatants, there's a character to match your preferences. The roster of distinctive characters continues to expand.





  • Become a master of your favorite character!

Each character comes with a set of skills that can be swapped out.
Customize your character's combat style to suit your tastes or adapt to the situation and strategy.
Become the master of the characters you love and want to play.





  • We are passionate about action games.

This game is being crafted by individuals who have diligently explored the realm of action gaming, and they are eager to join you, our users, in the pursuit of thrilling action gameplay.
We are relentless in our pursuit of fun and believe that a game should never stop being enjoyable.
With your continuous feedback and collaboration, we aim to create the best action game recognized by action gamers worldwide.
Join us on this journey to craft the world's greatest action game together, starting small but aiming high!
